title: 80/681/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 June 1980 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 June 1980  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Belgium pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC  (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)  (80/681/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions for the implementation of Directive 72/159/EEC forwarded by the Belgian Government on 16 July 1974 continue, in the light of the provisions specified in the recitals, to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 June 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1.
